description:
Portgas D. Ace, nicknamed "Fire Fist Ace", is the older brother of Monkey D. Luffy. He is the 2nd division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates and one-time captain of the Spade Pirates.
Born as Gol D. Ace, he is the son of the Pirate King, Gol D. Roger and his lover, Portgas D. Rouge (both deceased). He was adopted by Monkey D. Garp as wished by Roger to him before his birth.
Later on in his childhood, he became sworn blood brothers with Luffy and Sabo.
name: Portgas D. Ace
